New Records: Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double with 37 points, 18 rebounds, and 15 assists, marking his fourth straight triple-double and the 136th of his career, moving him closer to tying Magic Johnson's all-time triple-double record
Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic's dominant performance with a triple-double led the Nuggets to a 122-120 victory over the Dallas Mavericks
Pre-Game Insights: Denver Nuggets head coach Michael Malone expressed his frustration with Jokic's low MVP voting status after his standout performance
Post-Match Reflections: Michael Malone praised Jokic's consistency and discipline, while Michael Porter Jr. highlighted Jokic's ability to perform at a high level every night
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jokic's teammates were in awe of his performance, emphasizing his consistency and work ethic
